text: Between January and now, I lost 60 pounds, no joke. I was pre-diabetic and that's a thing now of the past. My blood pressure, that was through the roof, is now relatively normal. Thank you for everything.
author: Chinwe E.

text: CFA isn't just a gym, it's an awesome supportive community. No matter your skill level, everyone wants to see everyone else that walks through the door succeed! The coaching staff is awesome, and the owners are very involved.
author: Randy H.

text: I love CrossFit Aggieland! You guys keep this single mom sane. The coaches, atmosphere, programming, and gym are all superior to what I've seen at other boxes. I'll be a loyal member for as long as I live here.
author: Tasha M.

text: I LOVE this place. The coaches are great, the community you all have built is unmatched! Sometimes I get burnt out on CrossFit, but I would never ever want to leave the people. I'm a for-lifer for sure.
author: Jillian C.

text: I'm hooked. I'm getting great workouts and great coaching, and I really enjoy the community that's come together around the gym. I joined because I wanted to get better, and I've ended up feeling better, stronger, and happier.
author: Joe U.
